General.Name: Ulima Nitra PT
General.Description: PT Ulima Nitra Tbk offers coal mining, truck and heavy equipment rental, construction, and other services. It also engages in the petroleum and natural gas mining activities; excavation of stone, sand, and other clay; collection, management, and disposal of hazardous wastewater; installation of foundation and piles; and transportation of special goods. In addition, the company constructs roadways; groundwater wells; and oil and gas processing and storage buildings. PT Ulima Nitra Tbk was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Palembang, Indonesia.
